channel.title: Error when I compile! Please help :)
channel.description: Hello, this is what I get on my compiler.... [code]NPCHandler.java:1697: illegal start of expression public static boolean isdropping = false; 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...[/code] Thats my error, thanks ppl!

item.title: Error when I compile! Please help :)
item.dc:creator: @mcnuget5 mcnuget5
item.description:
@mcnuget5 wrote:

[quote=“PLAYTIME, post:1, topic:168354”]Hello, this is what I get on my compiler…

NPCHandler.java:1697: illegal start of expression public static boolean isdropping = false; 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue...
Thats my error, thanks ppl![/quote]

try and go back and delete what ever u did to fix it>…

Read full topic

item.description:
@PLAYTIME wrote:

delta:

Well what was the last thing you added? Im guessing it was something above it

Yes it was, i added some npcs, so they can talk[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2007, 07:01:48 PM[/size][hr][quote=“Hockey4lifexx, post:5, topic:168354”]if ur using a tutorial then make sure u copied all of the code, even if there r spaces u need to add them[/quote]
I wasn’t useing a tut or anything, it just started saying that out of no where…
